sense.def:
To pluck something from somewhere
pomeni nekaj prijeti in s hitrim gibom potegniti ven;

seg.quote: He plucked a tomato and offered it to Hilda.
He laughed and plucked the paper from my hand.

sense.def:
To pluck a chicken
pomeni odstraniti perje piščancu ali drugi mrtvi ptici, preden jo skuhamo ali spečemo.

To pluck a guitar
pomeni s prsti prijeti strune na kitari ali drugem inštrumentu s strunami in jih nato spustiti, da nastane zvok.

To pluck up the courage to do something
pomeni premagati strah in narediti nekaj, česar se bojimo.

seg.quote: I eventually plucked up enough courage to go in.
